headline: EBARA DRY VACUUM PUMP 42.2 CFM
description: Rebuilt Dry Vacuum Pump         Pumping speed and ultimate pressure are based on 60 Hz operation.
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
